Sentence.sentence: While the practice carries serious health risks for many, those dangers are outweighed by the social and economic gains for poor urban farmers and consumers who need affordable food.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We have to understand and think about the implications, and balance these  great innovations with the potential downsides they naturally carry with them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: You say your shop has been doing well, could you give me some idea of what doing well means in facts and figures?Birds are famous for carrying things around.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Salmon also carry dangerous chemicals as the fish migrate between rivers and the sea.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: People who live, hunt or fish near bird coloniesneed to be careful, the researchers say, The birds don’t mean to cause harm, but the chemicals they carry can cause major problems.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Other birds unknowingly carry seeds that cling to them for the ride.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They typically carry financial burdens that outweigh those of their peers, are more likely to work while attending school, and often require significant academic remediation ( ' ,  补习 ).
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is too risky to carry on.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But the Food and Drug Administration has not approved Avastin for use in the eye, and using it rather than the alternative, Lucentis, might carry an additional, although slight, safety risk.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But more recently, companies have begun to plan more affordable After being dogged by technical delays for years, Sir Richard Branson, Virgin Galactic's founder, had recently suggested that a SpaceShipTwo craft would carry its first paying customers as soon as February 2015.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But it is another thing to have a supply of trained talent that could let you carry out this promise.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A 2001 study cataloged all the ways in which the term Black carried connotations ( ' ,  涵义 ) that were more negative than those of African American.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Abilene Christian settled on the devices after surveying students and finding that they did not like hauling around their laptops, but that most of them always carried a cell phone, Dr. Dickson said.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: the man whose horse trots（奔跑）a mile in a minute does not carry the most important messages.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They want to know if the economic crisis would affect our ability to carry out the deal we signed last November.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It carried passengers leaving an island.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The plane was carrying 180 passengers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "You've also got color, texture and shape sensors looking down at the ground to check pasture quality," says Salah Sukkarieh of the University of Sydney, who will carry out trials on several farms in central New South Wales.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: After being dogged by technical delays for years, sir Richard Branson, virgin Galactic's founder, had recently suggested that a Spaceship Two craft would carry its first paying customers as soon as February 2015.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: But they can attain more distant orbits; NASA plans for most of its future Earth-escaping payloads to the moon and Mars especially to carry CubeSats.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: It doesn't mean that my to-do lists no longer exist, but I've become more aware of the importance of slowing down and making sure that I enjoy the daily activities as I carry them out.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They typically carry financial burdens that outweigh those of their peers, are more likely to work while attending school, and often require significant academic remediation.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"带，拿，取"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: bring, carry, take, fetch, get, convey, transport
means: bring ： 指从某处把人或物带到或拿到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
carry ： 指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。
take ： 指从说话人或说话人心目中所在处把某人或某物带离开，带到离说话者有一定距离的地方，与bring的方向正相反，侧重方向，不着重方式。
fetch ： 指一往一返，相当于go and bring，去取了东西或带人再返回到出发处。
get ： 口语用词，与fetch基本同义，语气随便。
convey ： 指通过中间人传递信息，或以某种方式把人或物送到目的地。
transport ： 指使用车辆或机械设备把人或货物从一处运载到另一处。

example.en: Tom is trying to curry below the knee with the boss to get a promotion.
example.zh: 为了获得提升，汤姆正在想方设法讨好他的上司。

example.en: He carried a case on $1,000 bail.
example.zh: 他交保1,000美元后在外候审。

list.explanation: [无业游民用语]流浪街头无处过夜

example.en: I have carried the banner in in-fernal metropolises.
example.zh: 我曾在一些地狱般的大都市整夜流浪街头。

stems_affixes.word_buile: carry携带, 运送+age物品→马车, 客车

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运送者, 邮递员, 带菌者
stems_affixes.word_buile: carry携带, 运送+er人→carrier运送者, 带菌者
car装载,负担+t→n.大车, 手推车

stems_affixes.value_cn: 携带, 运送, 支持, 支撑, 传送, 意味
stems_affixes.word_buile: car装载,负担+ry→携带, 运送

Sentence.sentence: Armed with this knowledge, they're able to carry out individually targeted campaigns to cheat people.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: As one group of workers carried out the rubbish, another group began removing seats and other theater equipment in preparation for the building's end.

Sentence.sentence: As usually I helped him carry his bags into his study.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: At least, workers wouldn't have needed to carry cattle fat or water to smooth the paths.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读E 原文

Sentence.sentence: Brooks carries this through to the death of one of his characters.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读E 原文

Sentence.sentence: Dad carried the pot out and we opened doors and windows to air out the house.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Even when the machines are recycled and the harmful metals removed, the recycling process often is carried out in poor countries, in practically uncontrolled ways which allow many poisonous substances to escape into the environment.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: From there, dogsled drivers- known as "mushers" - would carry it to nome in a relay.

Sentence.sentence: Generally, it contains no more than 75, 000 entries, making it easy to carry to class and efficient to use.

Sentence.sentence: He gave himself a new name to hide his identity when he went to carry out the secret task.

Sentence.sentence: Her father Peter, 44, wantS her to give up school to model full-time, but Sarah, who has taken part in shows along with top models wants to prove that she has brains as well as beauty she is determined to carry on with her education.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: His parents always had him weeding the garden, carrying out the garbage and delivering newspapers.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: I carried it to the vet's, and was asked to make payment immediately.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 完形填空 A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I carried my football everywhere for practice.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I hate it when she calls me at work—I'm always too busy to carry on a conversation with her.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I helped carry the young man out of the water.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I would be a different person if my mom hadn't turned a silly bicycle accessory into a life lesson I carry with me today.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's not easy to carry around, especially when boxed inside a massive skull.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: It was carried out once a year.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: My mother and father were united in their way of raising children, but it mostly fell to my mother to actually carry it out.

Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: This knowledge carries over in their attitude toward their future relationships.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 选项

Sentence.sentence: Even today, in our industrial life, apart from certain values of industriousness and thrift, the intellectual and emotional reaction of the forms of human association under which the world's work is carried on receives little attention as compared with physical output.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: And, unless banks carry toxic assets at prices that attract buyers, reviving the banking system will be difficult.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In the idealized version of how science is done, facts about the world are waiting to be observed and collected by objective researchers who use the scientific method to carry out their work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The administration was in essence asserting that because it didn't want to carry out Congress's immigration wishes,no state should be allowed to do so either.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Airborne technologies, such as different types of radar and photographic equipment carried by airplanes or spacecraft, allow archaeologists to learn about what lies beneath the ground without digging.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Another factor may be that more people are trying to overpack their carry-on bags to avoid checked-baggage fees, though the airlines strongly dispute this.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: "Carry a book with you at all times" can actually work, too-providing you dip in often enough, so that reading becomes the default state from which you temporarily surface to take care of business, before dropping back down.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: He's feeling positive, but he'll carry on blogging-not about eating as cheaply as you can—"there are so many people in a much worse state, with barely any money to spend on food"—but eating well on a budget.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: I'm experiencing increased zeal for working out since I no longer carry the burden of a disappointing morning weigh-in.

Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: We unconsciously associate fast food with speed and impatience and carry those impulses into whatever else we're doing.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

(Brit. informal)take responsibility for a mistake or misdeed

jx.jx_en_mean: act on a plan or proposal

lj.lj_ly: the report is expected to &B{carry} considerable &B{weight with} the administration.

lj.lj_ly: I got a bit carried away when describing his dreadful season.
lj.lj_ls: 在描述他那段可怕的时间时，我有些失控。

entry.def: If you carry something, you take it with you, holding it so that it does not touch the ground.

example.ex: He was carrying a briefcase...
example.tran: 他提着公文包。

example.ex: He carried the plate through to the dining room...
example.tran: 他端着盘子来到餐厅。

entry.def: If you carry something, you have it with you wherever you go.

example.ex: You have to carry a bleeper so that they can call you in at any time.
example.tran: 你要随身带着寻呼机,以便他们随时呼你。

entry.def: If something carries a person or thing somewhere, it takes them there.

example.ex: Flowers are designed to attract insects which then carry the pollen from plant to plant...
example.tran: 花的作用在于吸引昆虫，然后昆虫再将花粉传到其他植株上。

example.ex: The delegation was carrying a message of thanks to President Mubarak...
example.tran: 代表团向穆巴拉克总统转达了谢意。

entry.def: If a person or animal is carrying a disease, they are infected with it and can pass it on to other people or animals.

example.ex: The official number of people carrying the AIDS virus is low...
example.tran: 艾滋病病毒携带者的官方数字并不高。

example.ex: Frogs eat pests which destroy crops and carry diseases.
example.tran: 青蛙吃破坏庄稼、传播疾病的害虫。

entry.def: If an action or situation has a particular quality or consequence, you can say that it carries it.

example.ex: Check that any medication you're taking carries no risk for your developing baby...
example.tran: 仔细检查,确保你所服用的任何药物不会对胎儿造成危险。

example.ex: Individualism, and the breakdown of social harmony, had a constructive purpose. But they also carried a price.
example.tran: 个人主义以及社会和谐的崩溃具有一定的建设意义,然而这也是有代价的。

entry.def: If a quality or advantage carries someone into a particular position or through a difficult situation, it helps them to achieve that position or deal with that situation.
entry.tran: 使达到(目标);帮助…渡过(难关)

example.ex: He had the ruthless streak necessary to carry him into the Cabinet...
example.tran: 他具有进入内阁所必需的冷酷性格。

example.ex: The warmth and strength of their relationship carried them through difficult times.
example.tran: 他们互相关心,关系牢固,这才熬过了艰难岁月。

entry.def: If you carry an idea or a method to a particular extent, you use or develop it to that extent.

example.ex: It's not such a new idea, but I carried it to extremes...
example.tran: 这虽然不是什么新想法，但是我将它发挥到了极致。

example.ex: We could carry that one step further by taking the same genes and putting them into another crop.
example.tran: 我们可以再进一步：取出相同的基因,并将它们植入另一植株。

entry.def: If a newspaper or poster carries a picture or a piece of writing, it contains it or displays it.

example.ex: Several papers carry the photograph of Mr Anderson.
example.tran: 好几份报纸都刊登了安德森先生的照片。

entry.def: In a debate, if a proposal or motion is carried, a majority of people vote in favour of it.

example.ex: A motion backing its economic policy was carried by 322 votes to 296.
example.tran: 一项支持其经济政策的动议以322票对296票通过。

entry.def: If a crime carries a particular punishment, a person who is found guilty of that crime will receive that punishment.

example.ex: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
example.tran: 这是间谍罪,应判死刑。

entry.def: If a sound carries, it can be heard a long way away.

example.ex: Even in this stillness Leaphorn doubted if the sound would carry far.
example.tran: 就是在这样的寂静当中,利普霍恩也怀疑声音不会传很远。

entry.def: If a candidate or party carries a state or area, they win the election in that state or area.
entry.tran: (候选人或党派)在(某州或某选区)获胜

example.ex: George W. Bush carried the state with 56 percent of the vote.
example.tran: 乔治·W. 布什在该州以56%的得票率获胜。

entry.def: If you carry yourself in a particular way, you walk and move in that way.

example.ex: They carried themselves with great pride and dignity.
example.tran: 他们举手投足间透着傲气和高贵。

entry.def: If a woman is carrying a child, she is pregnant.

example.ex: There are many theories that claim to be able to predict whether you're carrying a boy or a girl.
example.tran: 有许多理论声称能够预测胎儿的性别。

entry.def: If you get carried away or are carried away, you are so eager or excited about something that you do something hasty or foolish.
entry.tran: 急不可待;喜不自胜;忘乎所以

example.ex: I got completely carried away and almost cried.
example.tran: 我激动不已,几乎哭了出来。

entry.def: If a person or team carries all before them, they succeed very easily.

example.ex: In the formative years their alliance carried all before it.
example.tran: 在草创阶段,他们的联盟所向披靡。

means.word_mean: 1. move while supporting, either in a vehicle or in one's hands or on one's body;

sentences.sentence: "These pipes carry waste water into the river"

means.word_mean: 2. have with oneself; have on one's person;

sentences.sentence: "She packs a gun when she goes into the mountains"

means.word_mean: 3. transmit or serve as the medium for transmission;
4. serve as a means for expressing something;

sentences.sentence: "The painting of Mary carries motherly love"
"His voice carried a lot af anger"

means.word_mean: 5. bear or be able to bear the weight, pressure,or responsibility of;

sentences.sentence: "How many credits is this student carrying?"

means.word_mean: 6. support or hold in a certain manner;

sentences.sentence: "She carries her ideas to the extreme"
"The civil war carried into the neighboring province"
"The disease extended into the remote mountain provinces"

means.word_mean: 10. be necessarily associated with or result in or involve;

sentences.sentence: "This crime carries a penalty of five years in prison"
"How many people are carried on the payroll?"
"They conducted themselves well during these difficult times"

means.word_mean: 15. include as the content; broadcast or publicize;

sentences.sentence: "All major networks carried the press conference"
"The news was carried to every village in the province"

means.word_mean: 18. have as an inherent or characteristic feature or have as a consequence;

sentences.sentence: "This new washer carries a two year guarantee"
"The loan carries a high interest rate"

means.word_mean: 19. be conveyed over a certain distance;

sentences.sentence: "Her voice carries very well in this big opera house"
"The Federal Government carried the province for many years"
"I carry her image in my mind's eye"
"I will carry the secret to my grave"
"I carry these thoughts in the back of my head"
"I carry a lot of life insurance"
"His speech did not sway the voters"

means.word_mean: 23. compensate for a weaker partner or member by one's own performance;

sentences.sentence: "I resent having to carry her all the time"

means.word_mean: 25. have on the surface or on the skin;

sentences.sentence: "The troops carried the town after a brief fight"

means.word_mean: 27. transfer (entries) from one account book to another
28. transfer (a number, cipher, or remainder) to the next column or unit's place before or after, in addition or multiplication;
29. pursue a line of scent or be a bearer;

sentences.sentence: "the dog was taught to fetch and carry"
"The sudden gust of air propelled the ball to the other side of the fence"

means.word_mean: 32. drink alcohol without showing ill effects;

sentences.sentence: "he had drunk more than he could carry"
"This land will carry ten cows to the acre"

means.word_mean: 35. cover a certain distance or advance beyond;
36. secure the passage or adoption (of bills and motions);

sentences.sentence: "She lost the game but carried the match"

means.word_mean: 38. sing or play against other voices or parts;

sentences.sentence: "The are expecting another child in January"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French and Old Northern French carier, based on Latin carrus 'wheeled vehicle'

sentences.en: We could carry that one step further by taking the same genes and putting them into another crop.

sentences.en: It's not such a new idea, but I carried it to extremes...

sentences.en: Check that any medication you're taking carries no risk for your developing baby...

sentences.en: Individualism, and the breakdown of social harmony, had a constructive purpose. But they also carried a price.

sentences.en: He had the ruthless streak necessary to carry him into the Cabinet...

sentences.cn: 他们互相关心,关系牢固,这才熬过了艰难岁月。
sentences.en: The warmth and strength of their relationship carried them through difficult times.

sentences.cn: 他提着公文包。

sentences.en: He carried the plate through to the dining room...

sentences.cn: 你要随身带着寻呼机,以便他们随时呼你。
sentences.en: You have to carry a bleeper so that they can call you in at any time.

sentences.cn: 花的作用在于吸引昆虫，然后昆虫再将花粉传到其他植株上。
sentences.en: Flowers are designed to attract insects which then carry the pollen from plant to plant...

sentences.en: The delegation was carrying a message of thanks to President Mubarak...

sentences.en: Frogs eat pests which destroy crops and carry diseases.

sentences.en: He is carrying the department (= it is only working because of his efforts) .

sentences.cn: 到后来,贝基柔弱的四肢再也支撑不住,她一步也走不动了.
sentences.en: At last Becky's frail limbs refused to carry her farther . She sat down.

sentences.en: The balusters carry a railing.

sentences.en: The three columns carry the roof.

sentences.en: Rafters carry the weight of the roof.

sentences.en: The official number of people carrying the AIDS virus is low...

sentences.en: Other  birds unknowingly carry seeds that cling to them for the ride

sentences.cn: 鲑鱼在海洋和河流间迁徙时也携带了有害的化学物质。
sentences.en: Salmon  also  carry dangerous  chemicals  as  the  fish migrate between rivers and the sea

sentences.cn: 研究人员说：“在鸟群附近生活、捕猎和钓鱼的人类需要小心一些。这些鸟并不想带来伤害，但它们携带的化学物质会引发严重的问题。
sentences.en: “People who live, hunt or fish near bird coloniesneed to be careful,” the researchers say, “The birds don’t mean to cause  harm,  but  the  chemicals  they  carry can cause major problems.”
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.en: Some jellyfish are vegetarians that grow their own food and carry it with them.

sentences.en: The nanodroplets carry the nutraceutical nanoparticals through membranes and release them upon reaching their destination.

sentences.en: Most umbrellas fold up, so it's easy to carry them.

sentences.en: I'm taking these apples out of the bag to lessen the load I have to carry.

sentences.en: Dont be afraid to learn. Knowledge is weightless, a treasure you can always carry easily.

sentences.en: These rods are brand new and carry Orvis'full product warranty.

sentences.en: However, the new study does not show if wild animals naturally carry the SARS virus.

sentences.en: Why did you carry food for Aunt Sheep?

sentences.cn: 每个油炸圈饼会运送你一公里.
